Why do you split it into rars?
Its not the 90's anymore...

splitting the video into about 40 files is not only inefficient, it's also a way to hide viruses, spyware and other malware, with the other garbage files.

fortunately, ahashare dot com has good version of it in one file, with plenty of seeders.
